plot: Maka's fight with Crona takes a very surprising turn when she puts herself in danger, hoping her actions will free the odd little Meister from a life of pain.
title: Sôru îtâ" Todoke, watashi no tamashii. Kawaita kokoro, tamaranai kodoku no naka de...?
plot_es: Maka's fight with Crona takes a very surprising turn when she puts herself in danger, hoping her actions will free the odd little Meister from a life of pain.
original_name: Sôru îtâ" Todoke, watashi no tamashii. Kawaita kokoro, tamaranai kodoku no naka de...?
